newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: HIM FURNESS 1996 PROFIT 4.2 MLN GUILDERS.
newsitem.headline: HIM FURNESS 1996 PROFIT 4.2 MLN GUILDERS.

text.p: Profit at Dutch industrial investment firm HIM Furness amounted to 4.2 million guilders in 1996, the company said in a statement on Wednesday.
It said Furness bv, which was fully acquired in the course of 1996, had made a profit of 4.5 million guilders.
The firm proposed a dividend of 4.15 guilders per share.
Furness, a port services company, is the only active unit of HIM Furness.
HIM Furness said it expected 1997 to be more profitable than 1996, as last year's measures to streamline and improve activities will take effect.
It said it expected interest charges to rise in 1997.
